name: Flappy Bird Recreated 1.0
description:
Are you bored? good thing that there is a game called "Flappy Bird", but the game was officially deleted from google play by the creator (Dong Nguyen) himself, BUT luckily, I remade the game so we all can play it.

Go through those pipes without touching it and get as much score as you can!

Created By: Dong Nguyen

Recreated By: Ridhwan056
